title: Purchase a Carbon Offset
description: During the booking process, a customer wants to purchase a carbon offset to mitigate the environmental impact of their flight.

tasks.description: Calculate the carbon emissions for the customer's specific itinerary.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system calculates the emissions for the flight.

tasks.description: Present the customer with the option to purchase a carbon offset for a specific price to make their trip carbon neutral.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly presents the offset option and cost.

tasks.description: The customer agrees. Add the cost of the offset to their booking and process the payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sells the carbon offset.
